programme.title: Bike World
programme.desc: Bike World revolves around the speedway and the racers swishing by on their two wheelers. Find out the latest news and reports regarding two-wheel competitions in the world of speed. This is the content to enjoy for all motorcycle enthusiasts across the world. Explore the best motorbikes, top locations, and iconic racers who have a lot of fun doing it.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Exciting sports show that follows the hottest action from the world's most unique motor sport events. Viewers will have a chance to visit some interesting competitions- from IDEMITSU 600 Super Endurance at the Chang Interna-tional Circuit in Thailand, the winter edition of the Maroc Challenge in Morocco, to the Hispania Rally, the only European rally to take place in the desert, and many more. Viewers will also find out all the news from the world of motor sports.

programme.title: Perfect Ride S6
programme.desc: What's hot and what's not. There are quests to be undertaken, the search for the ideal auto, for the perfect race track for the ultimate accessory gadget. What are the preferred rides of the race legends?

programme.title: Supercars S6
programme.desc: There are details which set super cars apart from normal cars and these details are essential. Super cars are the biggest, loudest and most expensive cars on the highway; they're four-wheeled works of arts.

programme.title: Go Green!
programme.desc: Energy saving is becoming a more and more important goal for the world's leading car manufacturers. Motorvision TV explores the environment-friendly solutions emerging in the car industry. presenting the latest ideas from research and development teams. Find out what are the best ways to go green when it comes to your vehicle.

programme.title: Spotted
programme.desc: With its Model S, American carmaker Tesla wants to establish electric engines in the full size class. For the very first time it is possible to attain driving ranges over 400 kilometers. Its tremendous acceleration becomes an image boost for the brand. Porsche stands for lots of speed and horsepower, too. With its Panamera Sport Turismo, the sports car manufacturer taps into a new market.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.desc: It's time once again for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship! While the drivers are already out there doing test laps, we will be taking you behind the scenes and showing what really goes on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (The Cannon) S3 (n°27)
programme.desc: «The Cannon»The Stunt Heroes have a new car-canon in their arsenal. The canon accelerates a car in one second from zero to 70 km/h. The Stunt Heroes had something like that before. But the new canon doesn't produce any smoke. That is a very important feature for the filmmakers - now they don't have to digitally remove the smoke out of the stunt. In this episode the guys test the canon after shooting a wild car chase between three cops and a gangster on the autobahn.

programme.title: Supercars S5
programme.desc: He is one of the most exciting sportscars in the world: the Ferrari 458 Speciale. A screaming racecar for the street, a car that puts your nervs on permanent fire. To drive this rolling thunder is unforgetable. Also in this show. The Mc Laren 650S, a car as fast as the Ferrari but quiet more on the technical than on the emotional side.

programme.title: Classic Ride S2
programme.desc: Prince Leopold of Bavaria owns two cars, which can't be as oppositional: the BMW isetta and the BMW Z8. The BMW Isetta is one oft he most unusual and most successful smal cars of the 50ties. Designed like an egg on wheels, with a 250ccm motobike-engine and 12 hp. The BMW Z8 ist still a dreamcar, with a timeless design, 5-Liter engine and 400hp. Classic Rides follows Leopold of Bavaria, as he gets both cars ready fort he summer.

programme.title: Episode 13
programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.

programme.title: Grand Prix of Spain, Barcelona
programme.desc: The FIM X-Trial World Championship is the world's premier indoor motorcycle trials competition. MOTORVISION TV presents the highlights from the fourth round of the 2020 season, which takes place in Barcelona, Spain.

programme.title: AWD Safari Challenge
programme.desc: Watch the exciting Safari Championship organized by the British All Wheel Drive Club, in which modified 4x4 vehicles of all brands can participate.

programme.title: Hi-Tec Drift Allstars Series Australia
programme.desc: The latest drifting competition on Motorvision.TV brings you the best drifters from Australia. Join us for thrilling duels, smoking wheels and non-stop drift battles for the Drift All Stars Series title.

programme.title: San Antonio Race 2
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: Top Fuel Australia Championship
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: National Legend Cars
programme.desc: The Legends Cars National Championship brings back racing from yesteryear. The series features 5/8 scale replicas of pre-war 1930s Fords, Chevys and Dodges that are equipped with 125bhp-motorcycle engines. These cars are well known for delivering high-octane battles on race tracks around Great Britain.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (Front Flip over Cola Truck) S2 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Front Flip over Cola Truck»Stuntman Dominik Kowalski is an expert for falls, drops and body stunts. But today is different: he is supposed to drive the stunt car! The job: a flip through a cola truck! This is not for the weak-minded! Will Nick fail or is he the right man for this stunt?

programme.title: Supercars S5
programme.desc: The Porsche Panamera Turbo S is the most dynamic sedan in the world. No other car finds the perfect balance between calm gliding on the one hand and extreme performance on the other hand. 570 hp, 3,8 seconds from zero to 100 km/h and a top speed of 310 km/h are impressive performance data for this big car. Plus: the Jaguar XJR with a 550 hp V8 engine and the Mercedes CLS 500.

programme.title: Classic Ride S2
programme.desc: ""on Ice"".

programme.title: Episode 12
programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.

programme.title: Grand Prix of Hungary, Budapest
programme.desc: The FIM X-Trial World Championship is the world's premier indoor motorcycle trials competition. MOTORVISION TV presents the highlights from the third round of the 2020 season, which takes place in Budapest, Hungary.

programme.title: Rallye Munich - Marrakesh 1990
programme.desc: Difficult conditions over 5.000 kilometres. Extreme heat and treacherous water hazards, require everything from the amateur rally drivers.

programme.title: The Knight from Scotland, Sir Jackie Stewart
programme.desc: One of Britain's best known racing drivers, Sir Jackie Stewart is as respected for his work to improve driver safety standards as he is for his three world championships. Stewart's career encompassed some of the most dangerous years in the history of Formula One, and the Scottish driver's 27 impressive F1 wins pale into insignificance when compared with the number of lives he has helped to save.

programme.title: Silverstone
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: Classic Ride S4
programme.desc: A small group of car enthusiastic ladies offers resistance in the otherwise man dominated oldtimer world . One of them is Johanna. The 24-year-old loves her 69s Corvette more than everything. And she would never let a man sit behind the steering wheel of her V8.

programme.title: Chateau Impney Hill Climb
programme.desc: Motorsports has been taken place at the Château Impney near Droitwich Spa in Worcestershire, England since the 1950s. But no event was as big and successful as the Chateau Impney Hill Climb. Every year, the event attracts a wide array of vintage cars and more modern supercars. However, 2019 sees the last edition of the iconic Chateau Impney Hill Climb.

programme.title: Schall Motorsport
programme.desc: Since its opening in 1927, the Nürburgring has made a name for itself worldwide as the most demanding racetrack in the world. Nevertheless, or precisely because of this, numerous professional and amateur pilots dare to take on the Nordschleife adventure. Among them are Ralf and Andreas Schall, who have been participating in the races on the Nordschleife with their own racing team for 30 years.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (The Matrix) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «The Matrix»Martial arts specialist Ramazan creates a choreography for a fight. It involves four stuntmen who need to disguise as secret agents and bash on him. Will Ramazan be able to free himself from this uncomfortable position and who will spectacularly take off with a car? Find out on this episode of Stunt Heroes.

programme.title: Supercars S2
programme.desc: It's showtime! The BMW ACS5 Sport S Limousine is on the track. Last year at the International Motor Show it's 'smoother' brother was introduced and after the 'beauty' now the 'beast' is released.

programme.title: Classic Ride S2
programme.desc: There is a crazy new thing from Volkswagen. A car that can dress up after you get it, to look anyway you want it. A car that can be anything, can do anything, is a car that only can be called The Thing by Volkswagen.

programme.title: Episode 14
programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.

programme.title: Grand Prix of Spain, Bilbao
programme.desc: Teams and drivers of the 2020 FIM X-Trial World Championship travel to Spain for the fifth round of the season. The round takes place at the Bizkaia Arena, which is the largest mixed-use venue in Spain. What the drivers didn't know at that time: The round in Bilbao became the final round of the 2020 season, because the finale in Andorra got cancelled due to the coronavirus pandemic.

programme.title: Championnat de Belgique des Rallyes
programme.desc: BRC.

programme.title: Rally Regione Piemonte, Italy
programme.desc: Amazing challenge around Europe includes 19 special stages. The top crew will become Tour European Rally champion in one of the most beautiful European rallies.

programme.title: Morocco Desert Challenge
programme.desc: The Morocco Desert Challenge has been the fastest growing rallies in the Sahara since its creation in 2008. Until May 2016 the event was called "the Libya Rally" because its origins were in Libya. As a result of the war in 2011 the Khadafi regime came to an end but it is still impossible to host a large international sports event in Libya. In 2013 the rally was moved to Morocco, and thanks to a huge variety of landscapes and tracks it was a success.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (The Stunt Convertible) S2 (n°25)
programme.desc: «The Stunt Convertible»A skidding lorry against a remote controlled family van. That's the new story the Stunt Heroes realize on their private Autobahn. Stunt coordinator Christoph Domanski's goal: to separate the roof from the rest of the car. If the plan works out, they will create a unique stunt convertible. A spectacular stunt test for Hollywood productions!

programme.title: Supercars S5
programme.desc: These days there's hardly a car manufacturer who doesn't build any kind of SUV. Three of the sportiest SUVs on the market are the Porsche Macan Turbo, Mercedes GLA 45 AMG and Audi RSQ3. Each of them comes with more than 300 HP; they are well prepared for any season and have ambitions to be sports car. Supercars finds out, if they have what it takes to be a sports car.

programme.title: Classic Ride S4
programme.desc: Car customizing has a long tradition. In the late 1960s the racing version of the Opel Rekord C, also known as 'Black Widow', caused a sensation on the tracks. Drivers like Erich Bitter and Niki Lauda enjoyed many successes with this 180 hp strong Rekord which is now making a comeback. Plus: Classic Ride celebrates 40 years of BMW M and drifts through the snow with the Volkswagen Rally Beetle.

programme.title: Episode 11
programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.
